column2: SELECT Name, IndepYear FROM world.country WHERE Continent="Africa" and IndepYear >=1990
SELECT Name, SurfaceArea FROM world.country WHERE Continent="Asia" ORDER BY SurfaceArea DESC  LIMIT 5
SELECT Name, LifeExpectancy FROM world.country WHERE Continent="Africa" AND LifeExpectancy IS NOT NULL ORDER BY LifeExpectancy  ASC LIMIT 1
